alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:26AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...An area of moderate to heavy rainfall will impact portions of north central Lamoille, northwestern Orleans, southeastern Grand Isle, north central Chittenden and Franklin Counties through 600 AM EDT... At 422 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a broad area of moderate to heavy rainfall. HAZARD...Heavy ponding on roadways and minor street flooding possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travelers may hydroplane on roadways where ponding occurs and clogged drainages may over top. Locations impacted include... Newport City, Enosburg Falls, Derby Center, Franklin, Jay, Newport Town, Jay In Franklin County, Montgomery Center, Montgomery, St. Albans City, Troy, Sheldon, Georgia, Enosburg, Swanton, Derby Line Village, Newport Center, St. Albans Town, Enosburg Falls Village, and Derby Center Village. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 105 and 129. Interstate 91 between mile markers 164 and 177. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Moderate to heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
